Lit by a chandelier and surrounded by trees, the atmosphere makes it feel like you’re drinking inside the world’s most elegant treehouse.ORDER THE: whatever appeals to you from the cocktail list that’s broken down by sections: Boozy, Delicate, Refreshing, and Overlooked, with the date and place of origin provided for every drink. As for the food, the menu is designed for sharing, so get a couple of the Serrano ham, truffled crispy fingerling potatoes with fresh ricotta, and the marinated artichoke and salsa verde.THE VIBE IS: late-night cool with artfully composed cocktails and stylish people to match. Later into the night, head over to the Elk Room (a curious little bar within this bar) for post-cocktail cocktails.PRACTICAL STUFF: Open every day: Monday to Thursday, from 5:30 p.m. to 1 a.m.; Friday to Saturday, from 5:30 p.m. to 2 a.m.; and Sunday, from 5:30 p.m. to midnight.
